title: Pain Threshold

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose a player, including yourself. They Resist, gaining basic defense tonight. If they are hanged tommorow, they don't die and their role is not revealed, and the day ends immediately. 3 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will redirect attacks against player who are Resisting to their attacker.
- You won't redirect attacks made by members of The Psychopath.
- If a player successfully Resists being hanged, you lose a charge of Resist, if you still have any.
- While you control The Psychopath, all members gain basic defense tonight. You learn of any player who attacks a Psychopathic member.
Kill Note Addition:
*"I hope it hurt."*

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure only you and your emotions remain.

desc:
Post 4923
*Shrug off the pain. They'll have to hurt you more.*
